name: doneness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state or quality of being cooked enough or to the correct degree: Cook the steaks for ten minutes or to the desired doneness. Bake the dish for 40 minutes, or until your preferred doneness is reached.
More examplesFewer examplesIf possible, use a thermometer to check the doneness of the meat.Check for doneness by tapping the bottom of the bread and listening to the sound.Begin checking for doneness after the biscuits have been in the oven for 10 minutes.The colour of cooked chicken is not a reliable sign of its doneness.Test the cake for doneness before taking it out of the oven.
